question: Who wrote the words on the tables of stone for the 10 Commandments?
Elijah went to Heaven in aâ€¦?

answer.explanation: a Timnathite - The Bible never says that Samson was married to Delilah (Judges 14&16)

question: In Genesis 4 a musician is named. Who was he?
Who was cremated in Jabeshgilead in 1 Samuel?
What does Beth-El (or Bethel) in Genesis 28 mean?
God told Abraham that his children would be as numerous as what two things?

choices.text: Leaves on the tree, grass in the field
Fish in the sea, birds in the air
Stars in the sky, sand on the beach
Cells in his body, hairs on his head

answer.explanation: Stars in the sky, sand on the beach (Genesis 22:17)

question: What did Jonathan eat not knowing that his father had forbidden his soldiers to eat the rest of the day?
The oldest man in the Bible, Methuselah died before his father. How could that be?

choices.text: We do not know who his father was

answer.explanation: His father did not die - Enoch (Genesis 5:24)

question: The word "hats" is only found once in the King James Version of the Bible. In which well-known story does it appear?

choices.text: Story of Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego

answer.explanation: Story of Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego - When they were put in the fiery furnace (Daniel 3:21)
